and he shall take<WH1980> Zedekiah<WH6667> to Babylon,<WH894> and he shall be there<WH8033> until<WH5704> I visit<WH6485> him, "declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068> "If<WH3588> you fight<WH3898> against<WH854> the Chaldeans,<WH3778> you shall not succeed<WH6743> "'?"
And Jeremiah<WH3414> said,<WH559> "The word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>

Then I knew<WH3045> that this<WH1931> was the word<WH1697> of the Lord.<WH3068>

"And I bought<WH7069> the field<WH7704> which<WH834> was at Anathoth<WH6068> from Hanamel<WH2601> my uncle's son,<WH1121> and I weighed<WH8254> out the silver<WH3701> for him, seventeen<WH7651> <WH6235> shekels<WH8255> of silver.<WH3701>
"And I signed<WH3789> and sealed<WH2856> the deed,<WH5612> and called<WH5749> in witnesses,<WH5707> and weighed<WH8254> out the silver<WH3701> on the scales.<WH3976>
"Then I took<WH3947> the deeds<WH5612> of purchase,<WH4736> both the sealed<WH2856> [copy containing] the terms<WH4687> and conditions,<WH2706> and the open<WH1540> [copy;]

and I gave<WH5414> the deed<WH5612> of purchase<WH4736> to Baruch<WH1263> the son<WH1121> of Neriah,<WH5374> the son<WH1121> of Mahseiah,<WH4271> in the sight<WH5869> of Hanamel<WH2601> my uncle's [son,] and in the sight<WH5869> of the witnesses<WH5707> who signed<WH3789> the deed<WH5612> of purchase,<WH4736> before<WH5869> all<WH3605> the Jews<WH3064> who were sitting<WH3427> in the court<WH2691> of the guard.<WH4307>
"And I commanded<WH6680> Baruch<WH1263> in their presence,<WH5869> saying,<WH559>

'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> "Take<WH3947> these<WH428> deeds,<WH5612> this<WH2088> sealed<WH2856> deed<WH5612> of purchase,<WH4736> and this<WH2088> open<WH1540> deed,<WH5612> and put<WH5414> them in an earthenware<WH2789> jar,<WH3627> that they may last<WH5975> a long<WH7227> time.<WH3117>"

'For thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> "Houses<WH1004> and fields<WH7704> and vineyards<WH3754> shall again<WH5750> be bought<WH7069> in this<WH384> land.<WH776>"'
"After<WH310> I had given<WH5414> the deed<WH5612> of purchase<WH4736> to Baruch<WH1263> the son<WH1121> of Neriah,<WH5374> then I prayed<WH6419> to the Lord,<WH3068> saying,<WH559>

'Ah Lord<WH136> God!<WH3068> Behold,<WH2009> Thou hast made<WH6213> the heavens<WH8064> and the earth<WH776> by Thy great<WH1419> power<WH3581> and by Thine outstretched<WH5186> arm!<WH2220> Nothing<WH3808> <WH3605> <WH1697> is too<WH4480> difficult<WH6381> for Thee,

who showest<WH6213> lovingkindness<WH2617> to thousands,<WH505> but repayest<WH9608> the iniquity<WH5771> of fathers into the bosom<WH1> of their children<WH2436> after<WH1121> them, O great<WH310> and mighty<WH1419> God.<WH1368> The Lord<WH410> of hosts<WH3068> is His name;<WH6635>

great<WH1419> in counsel<WH6098> and mighty<WH7227> in deed,<WH5950> whose<WH834> eyes<WH5869> are open<WH6491> to all<WH3605> the ways<WH1870> of the sons<WH1121> of men,<WH120> giving<WH5414> to everyone<WH376> according to his ways<WH1870> and according to the fruit<WH6529> of his deeds;<WH4611>

who<WH834> hast set<WH7760> signs<WH226> and wonders<WH4159> in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> [and] even to this<WH2088> day<WH3117> both in Israel<WH3478> and among mankind;<WH120> and Thou hast made<WH6213> a name<WH8034> for Thyself, as at this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>

'And Thou didst bring<WH3318> Thy people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> with signs<WH226> and with wonders,<WH4159> and with a strong<WH2389> hand<WH3027> and with an outstretched<WH5186> arm,<WH2220> and with great<WH1419> terror;<WH4172>
and gavest<WH5414> them this<WH384> land,<WH776> which<WH834> Thou didst swear<WH7650> to their forefathers to give<WH1> them, a land<WH5414> flowing<WH776> with milk<WH2100> and honey.<WH2461>

'And they came<WH935> in and took<WH3423> possession<WH3423> of it, but they did not obey<WH8085> Thy voice<WH6963> or walk<WH1980> in Thy law;<WH8451> they have done<WH6213> nothing<WH3808> of all<WH3605> that Thou commandedst<WH6680> them to do;<WH6213> therefore Thou hast made all<WH3605> this<WH384> calamity<WH9567> come<WH7122> upon them.

'Behold,<WH2009> the siege<WH5550> mounds<WH5550> have reached<WH935> the city<WH5892> to take<WH3920> it; and the city<WH5892> is given<WH5414> into the hand<WH3027> of the Chaldeans<WH3778> who fight<WH3898> against<WH5921> it, because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the sword,<WH2719> the famine,<WH7458> and the pestilence;<WH1698> and what<WH834> Thou hast spoken<WH1696> has come<WH1961> to pass;<WH1961> and, behold,<WH2009> Thou seest<WH7200> [it.]

'And Thou hast said<WH559> to me, O Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "Buy<WH7069> for yourself the field<WH7704> with money,<WH3701> and call<WH5749> in witnesses<WH5707>" – although the city<WH5892> is given<WH5414> into the hand<WH3027> of the Chaldeans.<WH3778>' "
Then the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to Jeremiah,<WH3414> saying,<WH559>
"Behold,<WH2009> I am the Lord,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of all<WH3605> flesh;<WH1320> is anything<WH3605> <WH1697> too<WH4480> difficult<WH6381> for Me?"

Therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord,<WH3068> "Behold,<WH2009> I am about to give<WH5414> this<WH384> city<WH5892> into the hand<WH3027> of the Chaldeans<WH3778> and into the hand<WH3027> of Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon,<WH894> and he shall take<WH3920> it.

"And the Chaldeans<WH3778> who are fighting<WH3898> against<WH5921> this<WH384> city<WH5892> shall enter<WH935> and set<WH3341> this<WH384> city<WH5892> on fire<WH784> and burn<WH8313> it, with the houses<WH1004> where<WH834> [people] have offered<WH6999> incense<WH6999> to Baal<WH1168> on their roofs<WH1406> and poured<WH5258> out libations<WH5262> to other<WH312> gods<WH430> to provoke<WH3707> Me to anger.<WH3707>

"Indeed<WH3588> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> and the sons<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> have been doing<WH6213> only<WH389> evil<WH7451> in My sight<WH5869> from their youth;<WH9334> for the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> have been only<WH389> provoking<WH3707> Me to anger<WH3707> by the work<WH4639> of their hands,<WH3027>" declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068>

"Indeed<WH3588> this<WH384> city<WH5892> has been<WH1961> to Me [a provocation of] My anger<WH639> and My wrath<WH2534> from the day<WH3117> that they built<WH1129> it, even to this<WH2088> day,<WH3117> that it should be removed<WH5493> from before<WH5921> My face,<WH6440>

because<WH5921> of all<WH3605> the evil<WH9567> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> and the sons<WH1121> of Judah,<WH3063> which<WH834> they have done<WH6213> to provoke<WH3707> Me to anger<WH3707> – they, their kings,<WH4428> their leaders,<WH8269> their priests,<WH3548> their prophets,<WH5030> the men<WH376> of Judah,<WH3063> and the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem.<WH3389>

"And they have turned<WH6437> [their] back<WH6203> to Me, and not [their] face;<WH6440> though [I] taught<WH3925> them, teaching<WH3925> again<WH7925> and again,<WH3925> they would not listen<WH8085> and receive<WH3947> instruction.<WH4148>
"But they put<WH7760> their detestable<WH8251> things<WH8251> in the house<WH1004> which<WH834> is called<WH7121> by My name,<WH8034> to defile<WH2930> it.

"And they built<WH1129> the high<WH1116> places<WH1116> of Baal<WH1168> that are in the valley<WH1516> of Ben-hinnom to cause their sons<WH1121> and their daughters<WH1323> to pass<WH5674> through<WH5674> [the fire] to Molech,<WH4432> which<WH834> I had not commanded<WH6680> them nor<WH3808> had it entered<WH5927> My mind<WH3820> that they should do<WH6213> this<WH384> abomination,<WH8441> to cause Judah<WH3063> to sin.<WH2398>

"Now<WH6258> therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> concerning<WH413> this<WH384> city<WH5892> of which<WH834> you say,<WH559> 'It is given<WH5414> into the hand<WH3027> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> by sword,<WH2719> by famine,<WH7458> and by pestilence.<WH1698>'

"Behold,<WH2009> I will gather<WH6908> them out of all<WH3605> the lands<WH776> to which<WH834> I have driven<WH5080> them in My anger,<WH639> in My wrath,<WH2534> and in great<WH1419> indignation;<WH7110> and I will bring<WH7725> them back<WH7725> to this<WH2088> place<WH4725> and make them dwell<WH3427> in safety.<WH983>
"And they shall be My people,<WH5971> and I will be their God;<WH430>

and I will give<WH5414> them one<WH259> heart<WH3820> and one<WH259> way,<WH1870> that they may fear<WH3372> Me always,<WH3605> <WH3117> for their own good,<WH9185> and for [the good of] their children<WH1121> after<WH310> them.

"And I will make<WH3772> an everlasting<WH5769> covenant<WH1285> with them that I will not turn<WH7725> away<WH7725> from them, to do<WH3190> them good;<WH3190> and I will put<WH5414> the fear<WH3374> of Me in their hearts<WH3824> so that they will not turn<WH5493> away<WH5493> from Me.

"And I will rejoice<WH7797> over<WH5921> them to do<WH3190> them good,<WH3190> and I will faithfully<WH571> plant<WH5193> them in this<WH384> land<WH776> with all<WH3605> My heart<WH3820> and with all<WH3605> My soul.<WH5315>

"For thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord,<WH3068> 'Just<WH9201> as I brought<WH935> all<WH3605> this<WH384> great<WH1419> disaster<WH9567> on this<WH2088> people,<WH5971> so<WH3651> I am going to bring<WH935> on them all<WH3605> the good<WH9186> that I am promising<WH1696> them.

'And fields<WH7704> shall be bought<WH7069> in this<WH384> land<WH776> of which<WH834> you say,<WH559> "It is a desolation,<WH8077> without<WH369> man<WH120> or beast;<WH929> it is given<WH5414> into the hand<WH3027> of the Chaldeans.<WH3778>"

'Men shall buy<WH7069> fields<WH7704> for money,<WH3701> sign<WH3789> and seal<WH2856> deeds,<WH5612> and call<WH5749> in witnesses<WH5707> in the land<WH776> of Benjamin,<WH1144> in the environs<WH5439> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> in the cities<WH5892> of Judah,<WH3063> in the cities<WH5892> of the hill<WH2022> country,<WH2022> in the cities<WH5892> of the lowland,<WH8219> and in the cities<WH5892> of the Negev;<WH5045> for I will restore<WH7725> their fortunes,<WH7622>' declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068> "
